org.pikater.shared

Class PropertiesHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pikater.shared.PropertiesHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MyJobScheduler

    public abstract class PropertiesHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides routines for subclasses to open a ".properties" file and fetch properties from it. All of the routines are properly handled and logged.
    Author:
    SkyCrawl

      • openProperties

        protected static java.util.Properties openProperties(java.io.File sourceFile)
        Routine for opening a .properties files.
        Parameters:
        resource - the desired .properties file
        logger - logger to use in case of problems
        Returns:
        the properties file wrapper of null in case of missing file

      • getProperty

        public static java.lang.String getProperty(java.util.Properties properties,
                           java.lang.String property)
        Returns the given property from the given loaded properties.
        Parameters:
        properties - the loaded properties
        property - key of the property to be fetched
        Returns:
        the designated result or null if the property was not found
